sms_sms_compose_tip_size_paragraphe_1: The maximum size of an SMS is 160 characters (GSM standard 03.38).
sms_sms_compose_tip_size_paragraphe_2: The two tables below list the authorised characters.
sms_sms_compose_tip_size_paragraphe_3: Important: If you use characters that do not appear in the tables, they will switch to Unicode, and will reduce the maximum size of an SMS to 70 characters.
